author: wrowe
msg: Don't panic, no I'm not suggesting we dump every binary into the
cvs repository (signatures of files might be useful though.)
This is simply to track the docs-like verbage on the distribution
directories.  If anyone else likes this idea, I'd be happy to go
back and tag the other platform's README/HEADER files into the tree.
